revised_title: Evolution and Taxonomy of Atlantic Deep Water Septibranch Bivalvia
tldr: This study examines the functional morphology and evolution of the Atlantic deep water species of the families Cuspidariidae and Poromyidae, focusing on the development of the septum and the anatomical differences between the families. The research also discusses the reproductive systems, siphon structures, and the relationships between the three families within the suborder Septibranchia.
